data.title: Ferrari Group
data.meta_description: Ferrari Group is the one-stop service provider specialising in the worldwide secure shipping of jewellery and luxury goods, providing value-added services for the logistics management of high-value merchandise. Ferrari Group provides impeccable tailor-made services worldwide, based on responsiveness, discretion and utmost security.
data.text:
“Ferrari Group was born in Italy, in the heart of the Mediterranean, in the cradle of civilization.

Here, Luxury was defined as we know it today. Here, through millennia of history, special sensitivities and skills have been developed to treat luxury goods not as mere commodities. Based on this original sensitivity, Ferrari Group has been working for over 60 years to ensure the best care in transports for everything that is precious.”

– Giorgio Deiana, President

The GIORGIO DEIANA FOUNDATION

was created by the Deiana family in memory

of Ferrari Group’s late President Mr. Giorgio Deiana, in order

to honor his legacy.

The Foundation supports several charity projects

internationally, and wishes to continue

Mr. Deiana’s work in helping and serving

the most needful.

Please click HERE to visit

the Foundation’s website.

The Ferrari Group is proud to announce the publication of its annual Sustainability Report for the year 2023. We invite all our stakeholders to review the 2023 report, to explore our initiatives and our efforts towards making a positive impact for a sustainable future.
